de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.curation

Class AnnotationSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.curation.AnnotationSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AnnotationSelection
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class comprises usernames, which agree on a specific annotation (same annotation type, same annotation value, same position).
    Author:
    Andreas Straninger
    See Also:

      • getAddressByUsername

        public Map<String,Integer> getAddressByUsername()

      • setAddressByUsername

        public void setAddressByUsername(Map<String,Integer> aAddressByUsername)
        Set Map of Username-Address-Tuples. The Map contains only annotations, which have the same annotation type and annotation value, and the same position in the cas.

        Example: 
         {"Anno1": 1234, "Anno2": 1235}
        Parameters:
        aAddressByUsername - HashMap of Username-Address-Tuples
